snippet.title: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver gameplay (PC Game, 1999)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver, PC game produced by Eidos in 1999 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/legacy-of-kain-soul-reaver/5248/
Showing off how Raziel became the Soul Reaver and the lore behind Legacy of Kain. This is one of the best games of the series so don't miss it out.
Played through modern Windows machine.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Rayman Forever - https://youtu.be/PMhBLOCPon8
